newsitem.title: USA: Brightpoint to acquire remaining interest in unit.
newsitem.headline: Brightpoint to acquire remaining interest in unit.

text.p: Brightpoint Inc said Tuesday that it has reached an agreement in principle to acquire the balance of the ownership of its subsidiary, Brightpoint International Ltd, for 400,000 shares and $5 million in cash.
The 50 percent interest being acquired is currently owned by Technology Resources International Ltd.
Brightpoint International is headquartered in Manchester, England, and is responsible for all of Brightpoint's sales and marketing efforts outside of North and South America.
Brightpoint said it expects to close the transaction during the fourth quarter of 1996.
Brightpoint Inc distributes wireless communication equipment and related products and provides related services including inventory management, fulfillment, packaging and programming.
Shares of Brightpoint rose 2-5/8 to 34-7/8 Tuesday. The company also said Tuesday it will split its stock three-for-two.
